name: Celestials AOS for iPhone
description:
***Important! Game does not support iPhone 3GS. ******

Lead your heroes against the forces of evil for an epic 3D fantasy adventure in Celestials: Eternian Chronicle!


Engage in fast-paced, heroic battles in the first-ever Aeon of Strife (AoS) / Defense of the Ancients (DotA) game optimized and tailored specifically for iPhone and iPad.

Celestials: Eternian Chronicle combines edge-of-your-seat combat with storytelling on an epic scale as players as you lead the clans of Eternia in a world-shattering campaign to save the universe from Doom Caster and his sinister minions. Discover the perils and wonders of the Mountain of Destiny, where magic meets advanced technology and cybernetic assassins rub shoulders with mystical martial artists.

Experience single-player battle arena-style gameplay developed specifically for iOS devices. Control a small group of elite units in quick and exciting objective-based encounters with enemy monsters. Intuitive controls and slick 3D environments put the real-time strategy and excitement of AoS games at your fingertips.

***
Player praise for Celestials: Eternian Chronicle:
"I've been waiting a long time for a game just like this. This is a revolution in mobile gaming!"
"I never thought a mobile game could tear me away from my computer, but this one did it!"
***
Reviews for Celestials: Eternian Chronicle:
"The developers have obviously thought long and hard about how to get an AoS style game to work on a touchscreen, and they have pulled it off. On iPad, the game is incredibly intuitive, and even on the smaller screened iPhone, the game is still easy to use." - TheSmartPhoneAppReview

"What makes Celestials: Eternian Chronicle so special is that the gameplay is so advanced. Players have the ability to customize and enhance everything from their buildings, heroes, minions, turrets and more. - AppDictions

"…a very fun tactical RPG that is chock full of content that will please the more core gamer while not scaring away the novice. There’s no reason why you shouldn’t check it out." 9/10 - "Super" -App Store Arcade

“Excellent, intelligent Gameplay. Celestials AOS for iPad is a graphically-rich 3D fighting game. Its sharp 3D graphics and tense gameplay help to make it arguably the most terrifying iOS game ever. The booming soundtrack and speech is incredible too.” - Best10Apps Editor's Pick

“The app is brilliantly designed, offering an expansive storyline, a wealth of characters called heroes, and enough fun to drown several weeks with.” - The iPhone APP Review

***

Game Features
* Stylish 3D graphics and environments
* Epic storyline told through 40 unique single-player missions
* Six heroes with unique appearance and abilities
* Two additional heroes unlocked through campaign mode and achievements
* 17 unique clans can be rallied in the struggle against the forces of evil
* Hundreds of items, upgrades and enhancements
* Excellent AI and thrilling game design
